showerReviews.reviewText: Stayed two nights primitive camping site #177 and #175 are shaded for most of day only one other site next to you plenty of room for two tents shower restrooms all very clean and in working order nice stay

‚Ä¶ wasn't that much geese residue if you know what I mean laying around. Everyone was having fun it wasn't real crowded and the water was great. The restrooms in the shower areas were very clean. I just wish there were a few more barbecue pits

Nice large sandy beach with plenty of parking. The beach area offered a playground, picnic shelters, restroom and shower facilities. The grounds and building were very well maintained. What a great place to spend tome time unwinding on a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ hot day. Added to the water where you can swim is a playground for kids. There is a rest room area, shower area, and a handicap parking. You can sit anywhere and barbeque and play your music, celebrate birthday and much more. You can also ‚Ä¶
It was nice to go to this place on this hot day , There is a rest room area, shower area, and a handicap parking

‚Ä¶ The only draw back is the cold water shower after a long day‚Äôs swim. Yes the shower is icy cold, but you may decide to take a shower back at home. Otherwise in every respect this is a nice beach for Columbus!
Not well, I car camp traveling across the US. And was very disappointed with no water or access to shower.

Very relaxing the beach area was recently cleaned very quiet for summer. Playground for the kids is nice bathrooms an shower available. Snack machines an soda available. Nice for picnic or walk or just relaxing in the sun.

‚Ä¶ ! There are also food trucks in the summer if you didn't BBQ! Cool summer classic place in the Midwest! It's not Florida or pure Michigan! The water is dirty! They do have showers! My suggestion if you use the water use the shower!! üëå!! ‚Ä¶

The water is sweet, ppl are nice, to see all the families there having fun is a great experience. The park is amazingly fun for the kid's.  There's food trucks, ice cream truck nd bathrooms/shower.
Familyfuntime. Beachtime

showerReviews.reviewText: One of Columbus's city pools. Very clean and fully staffed with Life-guards. A variety of pools with different depths, diving boards,  and 2 slides. This pool even has a Kiddie area separate from main area. If you've never attended you should give it a try, you will not be disappointed.

This pool was clean and the staff was great at keeping an eye on the kids. Compared to the last time it has seems to improved greatly! Also since you have to make reservations its not as crowded as it has been in the past! Definitely going to return!

Overall excellent and the pool is very cleaned
And clonidine bleach
